member.name: M:Abune.Server.Actor.MetricsActor.PreStart
member.summary:
User overridable callback.
Is called when an Actor is started. Actors are automatically started asynchronously when created. Empty default implementation.

member.name: M:Abune.Server.Actor.MetricsActor.PostStop
member.summary:
User overridable callback.
Is called asynchronously after 'actor.stop()' is invoked. Empty default implementation.

member.name: T:Abune.Server.Actor.ObjectActor
member.summary: Actor representing a world object.

member.name: M:Abune.Server.Actor.ObjectActor.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Abune.Server.Actor.ObjectActor.PersistenceId
member.summary: Gets id of the persistent entity for which messages should be replayed.

member.name: M:Abune.Server.Actor.ObjectActor.ReceiveCommand(System.Object)
member.summary: Command handler. Typically validates commands against current state - possibly by communicating with other actors. On successful validation, one or more events are derived from command and persisted.

member.name: M:Abune.Server.Actor.ObjectActor.ReceiveRecover(System.Object)
member.summary: Recovery handler that receives persistent events during recovery. If a state snapshot has been captured and saved, this handler will receive a message followed by events that are younger than offer itself. This handler must not have side-effects other than changing persistent actor state i.e. it should not perform actions that may fail, such as interacting with external services, for example. If there is a problem with recovering the state of the actor from the journal, the error will be logged and the actor will be stopped.

member.name: T:Abune.Shared.Protocol.MessageControlFlags
member.summary: Control flags for message header.

member.name: F:Abune.Shared.Protocol.MessageControlFlags.NOOP
member.summary: No Operation - 0b0000_0000 followed by [].

member.name: F:Abune.Shared.Protocol.MessageControlFlags.ACK
member.summary: Acknowledge (QoS 1) - 0b0000_0001 followed by [ACK-MESSAGEID] [...].

member.name: F:Abune.Shared.Protocol.MessageControlFlags.ACK2
member.summary: Acknowledge Response (QoS 2) - 0b0000_0011 [...] followed by [ACK-ACK-MESSAGEID] [...].

member.name: F:Abune.Shared.Protocol.MessageControlFlags.NACK
member.summary: Negative Acknoledgment (Qos 1, 2) - 0b0000_0100 [...] followed by [NACK-MESSAGEID] [...].

member.name: F:Abune.Shared.Protocol.MessageControlFlags.REJ
member.summary: Reject / Drop (Qos 1, 2) - 0b0000_1100 [...] followed by [NACK-MESSAGEID] [...].

member.name: F:Abune.Shared.Protocol.MessageControlFlags.QOS0
member.summary: Quality of service "none" - 0b0000_0000 [...] followed by [PAYLOAD].

member.name: F:Abune.Shared.Protocol.MessageControlFlags.QOS1
member.summary: Quality of service "at least once" - 0b0001_0000 [...] followed by [PAYLOAD].

member.name: F:Abune.Shared.Protocol.MessageControlFlags.QOS2
member.summary: Quality of service "exactly once" - 0b0011_0000 [...] followed by [PAYLOAD].

member.name: F:Abune.Shared.Protocol.MessageControlFlags.COMMAND
member.summary: Message with command - 0b1000_0000 followed by [...] [PAYLOAD].

member.name: T:UdpAkkaServer.ClientTwinActor
member.summary: Actor representing a connected game client.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:UdpAkkaServer.ClientTwinActor.CalculateClientLatency(Abune.Shared.Message.ClientPongMessage)
member.summary: TimeOffset = (t1 - t0) - (t2 - t3) Rountrip = (t3 - t0) - (t2 - t1) t0 is the client's timestamp of the request packet transmission, t1 is the server's timestamp of the request packet reception, t2 is the server's timestamp of the response packet transmission and t3 is the client's timestamp of the response packet reception.
